name: Blueprint kids-全民建造二次元梦想小镇
name_original: Blueprint kids-全民建造二次元梦想小镇
description:
Descriptions:
The happiest things in the life is to do funny things with funny mates!
Blueprint is developed by funny people, the developer gives life to Blueprint, the soul is waiting to be designed by you.
In Blueprint, you can show your inspiration, creativity and invention to establish your own world. Or enjoy the pleasure of building and micro-innovation by assembling or remaking. No rules, no limits, everything is at your disposal.
Features：
*Simple to operate and easy to follow, its designed to suit persons of all ages.
*3D presents your infinite creativity, its just like to create 3D cross stitch—more real than draw and more freedom than LEGO.
*Share works with your friends will increase your honor and earnings.
*Your works can be 3D printed, what kind of a surprise when your work is printed and standing in front of you?
